Text: if i were you i would remove this torrent as soon as possible as i can personally tell you from working with the band that they will take legal action against any individual uploading the album as many other people will soon be going to court

I don't know the band's stance on filesharing of their work, but in my country, I would never even know who they were or listened to them. They need some exposure somewhere, they are great, had i never downloaded any of their stuff, they never would have sold the albums I now own.
